name: Stockades
description: A fortified site for soldiers and defense; adventurers could obtain contracts, enlist aid, or break in to free captives.
atmosphere: The stockades have a grim, punitive atmosphere with the scent of fear and the sound of prisoners being held and the clank of iron restraints. The air carries the weight of punishment and the essential nature of public discipline, while the atmosphere crackles with the tension of captivity and the constant reminder of the consequences of breaking the law.
